sentences.sContent: Mostly produced in the last two years of his life, Cicero’s philosophy comprises a mixture of scepticism in the theory of knowledge and stoicism in ethics.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mostly produced in the last two years of his life, Cicero’s philosophy comprises a mixture of scepticism in the theory of knowledge and stoicism in ethics.
sentences.sCn: 西塞罗的创作绝大部分是在他生命的最后两年完成的，他的哲学包含了认识论上的怀疑主义和伦理学上斯多葛主义的混合。

words.tran: 坚忍的；禁欲的；斯多葛学派的

trans.tranCn: 斯多葛哲学，斯多葛学派
